blackengine.gameLogic.components.prefab

Class MovementComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackengine.gameLogic.components.base.ComponentBase
      • blackengine.gameLogic.components.prefab.MovementComponent

  • public class MovementComponent
extends ComponentBase
    An instance of this class will provide its parent with the ability to move.
